amendment.description: To prohibit funds from being used to process or approve a competition under Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76 for services provided as of June 1, 2004, by certain employees of the Bureau of Citizenship and Immigration Services of the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3584 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 168.

action.text: Amendment SA 3584 proposed by Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 3581. (consideration: CR S8950-8951; text: CR S8950) To prohibit funds from being used to process or approve a competition under Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76 for services provided as of June 1, 2004, by certain employees of the Bureau of Citizenship and Immigration Services of the Department of Homeland Security.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3584 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 168.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3584 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 47. Record Vote Number: 168.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3584 proposed by Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 3581.
